notes: Luxury modern apartment with high-end finishes including herringbone wood flooring, marble accent walls, built-in appliances, and recessed lighting. Excellent natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows in bedrooms. For baby safety, the floor-to-ceiling windows with balcony access in bedrooms would need childproofing, and the coffee table has sharp corners. Very clean condition with minimal furniture, spacious layout suitable for a growing family.
